title: spack install : glitches with mirrors
body:
The latest updates seem to have broken the support for mirror look-up during installation: 
$ spack mirror create -d /home/mculpo/production/spack-mirror -D netlib-scalapack

==> Trying to fetch from http://ftp.gnu.org/pub/gnu/ncurses/ncurses-6.0.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100,0%
==> Checksum passed for ncurses@6.0
==> Added ncurses@6.0.
==> Trying to fetch from http://cmake.org/files/v3.4/cmake-3.4.0.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100,0%
==> Checksum passed for cmake@3.4.0
==> Added cmake@3.4.0.
==> Trying to fetch from http://www.netlib.org/scalapack/scalapack-2.0.2.tgz
######################################################################## 100,0%
==> Checksum passed for netlib-scalapack@2.0.2
==> Added netlib-scalapack@2.0.2.
==> Trying to fetch from http://www.netlib.org/lapack/lapack-3.5.0.tgz
######################################################################## 100,0%
==> Checksum passed for netlib-blas@3.5.0
==> Added netlib-blas@3.5.0.
==> Trying to fetch from http://www.netlib.org/lapack/lapack-3.5.0.tgz
######################################################################## 100,0%
==> Checksum passed for netlib-lapack@3.5.0

==> Trying to fetch from http://www.mpich.org/static/downloads/3.2/mpich-3.2.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100,0%
==> Checksum passed for mpich@3.2
==> Added mpich@3.2.
==> Successfully updated mirror in /home/mculpo/production/spack-mirror.
  Archive stats:
    0    already present
    6    added
    0    failed to fetch.
then : ``` $ spack install netlib-lapack+shared ^ netlib-blas+fpic ==> Installing netlib-lapack ==> cmake is already installed in /home/mculpo/jetbrains/PyCharmProjects/spack/opt/spack/nuvolari/gcc-5.3.0/cmake-3.4.0-st54n6p6kjqrke3s7mk3yahiogpsi4uo. ==> netlib-blas is already installed in /home/mculpo/jetbrains/PyCharmProjects/spack/opt/spack/nuvolari/gcc-5.3.0/netlib-blas-3.5.0-eslnxxpgkvhqgkcr7znhuzm3jnkctirl. ==> Trying to fetch from file:///home/mculpo/production/netlib-lapack/netlib-lapack-3.5.0.tgz curl: (37) Couldn't open file /home/mculpo/production/netlib-lapack/netlib-lapack-3.5.0.tgz ==> Fetching from file:///home/mculpo/production/netlib-lapack/netlib-lapack-3.5.0.tgz failed. ... ``` It seems that `spack install` wrongly uses the parent of the mirror as the root of the mirror, i.e. it uses 
 /home/mculpo/production
instead of: 
 /home/mculpo/production/spack-mirror
